title: Refactor ESP8266 connect flows to non-blocking state machines
description: Replace long blocking delay/while connect loops in WiFi and MQTT paths with non-blocking state transitions and bounded retry backoff. Verify watchdog stability and reconnect behavior.

title: Harden MQTT/OTA security baseline for ESP12 monitor
description: Adopt TLS-capable MQTT transport strategy for production profiles, add OTA integrity/auth hardening, and validate secret handling/log redaction in config paths.
